title: Love Obsessed
description: A struggle between true love and family. From the moment that Brandon saw Erin in a local bar he was hooked. He had to protect her and make sure that she was treated right. Erin never expected to come across someone like Brandon in her life. She had looked after herself since she was a young teenager and now she has someone who is hell bent on looking after her.Cole has the desire to look after Erin too. He fell in love with her the first day that Brandon brought Erin home to meet the family. He has to have her, but at what cost?When all emotions are revealed, conflicts are caused, choices have to be made and Erin has to decide what is best for her, a best friend who will do anything for her or the love of her life.
author: Veronica Short
